title: Android Photo Frame App Infects Devices With Malware, Allows Full Remote Takeover

content.raw: A recent investigation has uncovered alarming security vulnerabilities in Android-powered digital photo frames, turning what should be a simple home or office gadget into a potent tool for cybercriminals. The findings reveal that apps preinstalled on these smart photo frames not only download and execute malware automatically but can also hand over complete device control […] The post Android Photo Frame App Infects Devices With Malware, Allows Full Remote Takeover appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
